metadata.dc:author: Hocsman Bartfeld, H
Granados Loarca, E A
Santaularia Segura, J M
Fariña Pérez, L
metadata.dc:description: A case of malignant priapism is described in a 58-year-old patient with metastatic carcinoma of the bladder. The diagnostic methods and the possibilities of palliative treatment are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Priapismo maligno. Legrado de los cuerpos cavernosos como medida paliativa.
[Malignant priapism. Curettage of the corpora cavernosa as a palliative measure].
